body: As many of you may or may not know, I've been around for 2 years, 2 months and 23 days.  It's strange, I never really introduced myself, its like I was out of the community one minute and in the next.  And then, roughly one year and two months after joining, I was demoted.  I can hardly believe it's been a full year.  And although I certainly have not forgotten about avicus, avicus seems to have forgotten about me.  So, after not playing minecraft for about three months, I hopped on today, and I think I'll stick around for a while.  So hello, my name is Storm997.  I'm new around here.  If you have any questions, feel free to ask.  Thanks! :3
body_tagged: As many of you may or may not know, I've been around for 2 years, 2 months and 23 days.  It's strange, I never really introduced myself, its like I was out of the community one minute and in the next.  And then, roughly one year and two months after joining, I was demoted.  I can hardly believe it's been a full year.  And although I certainly have not forgotten about avicus, avicus seems to have forgotten about me.  So, after not playing minecraft for about three months, I hopped on today, and I think I'll stick around for a while.  So hello, my name is Storm997.  I'm new around here.  If you have any questions, feel free to ask.  Thanks! :3
